EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Your application has been assigned to a Public Hearing on {!Case.Public_Hearing_Date__c}.
If this date is not convenient or you would like to change it for any reason, please call our offices during business hours so that we can help you find a different date.
Thank you,
San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency
